title: The ELO Hell song
body:
To the tune of "Centuries" by Fall Out Boy

In League of Legends Ranked mode,
some climb from Bronze up to Gold.
But you're stuck down here with me,
down here with me in Silver 3.

Du du du du du

replies.body: There is no elo hell. Just wanted to state the obvious
Nope, there are the same bad players, afks, trolls, etc.. In every elo. There is no elo hell

> [{quoted}](name=Live2LetDie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bJrrHkgs,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-08-09T01:37:13.375+0000)
>
> Nope, there are the same bad players, afks, trolls, etc.. In every elo. There is no elo hell

Im bronze but I strongly believe elo hell isn't in bronze. Its plat. Have you seen those plat guys? Omg Lol.... In bronze you have the occasional braindead who dies the same way 4 times and is like "Idk why i'm losing im first time and 0/2 but like wtf, renekton broken fosho" but those plat people troll on purps xD in bronze everyone is just dumb.
Plat is just toxic. It's considered the most toxic elo. One mistake and it's gg and your mom should die of cancer apparently

Haha ya, in bronze people just don't understand the game (myself included) but in plat people have a greater understanding, their just total douchebags. But the whole cancer thing is everywhere, I've probably been told to hang myself/get cancer/get hit by a car or bus/ kill myself about 300 times lol.

elo hell is simply where you can no longer solo carry, you hear it from bronze players because bronze sucks and it's hard to get out if you aren't skilled enough to solo carry, or if your role doesn't solo carry.
But I can dream, can't I?
I am done~ I am through~ I am just sick of it all~
Ranked is Hell in of itself and how high your rank is, is how much shite you were willing to put up with to get that respect.
i prefer it to the tune of robot devils song from futurama
